column4: does ubuntu use iptables or selinux? i can't ssh into my other linux box
can you ping the other box?
yes i can ping the other box
is sshd running on the other box?
ssh_exchange_identification: Connection closed by remote host
have you customized sshd_config a lot?
any particular reason you base authenticatin on hosts.allow?
no reason i thought the other ip was blocked but it isn't
so, did you change sshd_config alot?
it seems to me as if you messed up sshd_config
i got it working now, careful when u have the same username on both boxes, sshd doesn't like that
it works perfectly fine with me
my sshd_config file is a little more restrictive
really, sshd have no way of knowing the clients username anyway
afaik    i.e. it should not matter what the username on the client box is
